unfold upward_closed.
intros ol x y CO LOC.
apply (wf_col WF) in CO.

congruence.
assert (COE : upward_closed co_t E_t).
unfold upward_closed.
intros x y CO YIN.

unfolder in CO; desf.
assert (COD : upward_closed co_t W_t).
unfold upward_closed.

apply expand_transitive.

intros x y REL XIN.

destruct XIN as (y & ((YINE & ISW) & HLOC) & YMAP).

unfolder.
eauto 11.
clear - CO WF.

unfolder in CO.
desf.
arewrite (extra_a b_t ∩₁ W_s ⊆₁ set_compl (mapper ↑₁ E_t)).
rewrite (rsr_codom SIMREL).
clear.
unfolder.
ins.
desf.
tauto.
rewrite (wf_coE WF).
apply set_compl_mori.
unfold flip.
clear.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : actid) (PRED : reord_step_pred) (INB : E_t b_t) (NINA : ~ E_t a_t) (XIN : E_t x) (TID : tid x = tid b_t) (NIB : ~ match b_t with
  | InitEvent _ => true
  | ThreadEvent _ _ => false
  end) (NIX : ~ match x with
  | InitEvent _ => true
  | ThreadEvent _ _ => false
  end) (BZ : match b_t with
| InitEvent _ => 0
| ThreadEvent _ n => n
end < match x with
      | InitEvent _ => 0
      | ThreadEvent _ n => n
      end) : match b_t with
| InitEvent _ =>
    match x with
    | InitEvent _ => False
    | ThreadEvent _ _ => True
    end
| ThreadEvent t i =>
    match x with
    | InitEvent _ => False
    | ThreadEvent t' i' => t = t' /\ i < i'
    end
end.

    end

    end
end

fileSamples.hypotheses: (PRED : reord_step_pred) (SIMREL : reord_simrel) (x : actid) (XEQ : a_t = x) (XIN : E_s x)
fileSamples.proofString:
subst x.
unfolder.
unfold is_rel, is_acq, mod.
apply (rsr_acts SIMREL) in XIN.
destruct XIN as [(x' & XIN & MAP) | EXA].
rewrite <- MAP.
change (lab_s (mapper x')) with ((lab_s ∘ mapper) x').
rewrite (rsr_lab SIMREL); auto.
apply (rsr_bt_rlx PRED).
split; auto.
symmetry.
now apply rsr_mapinv_bt.
assert (NEQ : a_t <> b_t) by apply PRED.
exfalso.
red in EXA.
desf.
congruence.

fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite (eq a_t ∩₁ extra_a b_t ≡₁ ∅).
split; auto with hahn.
unfold extra_a; desf; [| basic_solver].
unfolder.

desf.
now apply (rsr_at_neq_bt PRED).
rewrite set_union_empty_r.
rewrite id_union, !seq_union_r, unionC.
apply inclusion_union_l.
unfolder.
ins.
desf.
eapply eba_loc; eauto.
now apply (rsr_as SIMREL).
rewrite <- (rsr_at_bt_loc PRED).
unfolder.
intros x' y'.
intros (    (XEQ & (x & XIN & XEQ')) &          LOC &    (YEQ & (y & YIN & YEQ'))  ).

assert (x = b_t) by now apply rsr_mapinv_bt.
assert (y = a_t) by now apply rsr_mapinv_at.
desf.

change (lab_s (mapper a_t)) with ((lab_s ∘ mapper) a_t) in LOC.
rewrite !(rsr_lab SIMREL) in LOC; auto.

split.

unfolder.

rewrite <- INCL, set_unionC.
rewrite <- (rsr_a_t_is_r_or_w PRED).
unfolder.
intros x (XEQ & (y & YIN & YEQ)).

apply rsr_mapinv_at; auto.

assert (INCL :    mapper ↑₁ ((R_t ∪₁ W_t) ∩₁ E_t) ⊆₁      (R_s ∪₁ W_s) ∩₁ mapper ↑₁ E_t  ).
unfolder.
intros x (y & (ACQ & YIN) & XEQ).
unfold is_w, is_r in *.
subst x.
change (lab_s (mapper y)) with ((lab_s ∘ mapper) y).
rewrite (rsr_lab SIMREL); eauto.
rewrite <- INCL, set_unionC.
rewrite <- (rsr_a_t_is_r_or_w PRED).
unfolder.
intros x (XEQ & (y & YIN & YEQ)).
subst x.
assert (y = a_t); desf; eauto.
apply rsr_mapinv_at; auto.
